thread.title: Pictures: Car on fire on M40 hard shoulder in Warwickshire | Central
thread.title_full: Pictures: Car on fire on M40 hard shoulder in Warwickshire | Central - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Pictures: Car on fire on M40 hard shoulder in Warwickshire | Central
text:
Highways England @HighwaysWMIDS Follow #Warwickshire Car ablaze on the Hard Shoulder. #M40 s/bound, J16 - J15. Emergency services are on their way. #Delays http://t.co/d6OnMA8cp6
18:59 - 12 Sep 2015 Retweet Reply Favourite Highways England @HighwaysWMIDS Follow #Warwickshire We've temporarily halted traffic on the #M40 s/bound, J16 - J15, while @ warksfirerescue tackle the fire http://t.co/EZUIjYADB6
19:07 - 12 Sep 2015 Retweet Reply Favourite Highways England @HighwaysWMIDS Follow #Warwickshire All lanes running on #M40 s/bound, J16 - J15, Congestion remains but should ease soon. Have a safe onward journey.
19:35 - 12 Sep 2015 Retweet Reply Favourite Last updated Sat 12 Sep 2015 Travel Warwickshire West Midlands
